entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Deep River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:57 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Garrison Petawawa 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 45 %
Dewpoint: -8.1°C
Wind: NNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow at times heavy beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to rain showers late in the evening then to a few flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 in the evening then falling. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
